‚ÄúFor anyone who wants to be a creator, BE ORIGINAL. BE KIND. SPREAD LOVE. If you have those three down, success is inevitable.‚Äù ‚ÄîLos Angeles-based creator Bryce Xavier (@brycexavier)‚Å£‚Å£
‚Å£‚Å£
We‚Äôre excited to announce the brand-new @creators account ‚Äî launching today! @creators is the place to learn more about what it takes to be a creator from the team at Instagram, and the amazing creators (like Bryce) who inspire us every day. ‚ö°Ô∏è
‚Å£‚Å£

‚Äú#YoSoy infinita,‚Äù says digital creator and author Dulce Candy (@dulcecandy). ‚ÄúExpressing my language, my culture, the music, the food ‚Äî putting it out there on social media for me is really important. It gives people a clear vision of who I am.‚Äù‚Å£
‚Å£
This week, we‚Äôre sharing portraits of Hispanic Heritage Award winners, taken by fellow award recipient Alexsey Reyes (@alexseyreyes).‚Å£
‚Å£
Join Dulce and other members of the Latinx community by sharing your story using #YoSoy in celebration of #HispanicHeritageMonth, which runs through October 15 in the US.‚Å£
‚Å£
Photo of @dulcecandy by @alexseyreyes‚Å£
Illustration by @itscovl

‚Äú#YoSoy humano,‚Äù says Walter Thompson-Hern√°ndez (@mychivas), a journalist at the New York Times. ‚ÄúI was always asking myself questions like, ‚ÄòAm I black?‚Äô ‚ÄòAm I brown?‚Äô I arrived to this moment where I realized that I could be both at the same time.‚Äù‚Å£
‚Å£
This week, we continue sharing portraits of Hispanic Heritage Award winners, taken by fellow award recipient Alexsey Reyes (@alexseyreyes).‚Å£
‚Å£
Join Walter and other members of the Latinx community by sharing your story using #YoSoy in celebration of #HispanicHeritageMonth, which runs through October 15 in the US.‚Å£
‚Å£
Photo of @mychivas by @alexseyreyes‚Å£

Go for a ride with Lea-Sophie Jell (@lea_jell_working_equitation) on our new series #DoYouFollow, which dives deep into some of Instagram's most popular interests and the people who make them awesome. üëç ‚ù§Ô∏è

#DoYouFollow equestrian Lea-Sophie Jell (@lea_jell_working_equitation)? Every day she practices her working equitation skills, a form of competitive horse riding. üèá‚ö°Ô∏è‚Å£‚Å£
‚Å£
In our new series #DoYouFollow, we‚Äôre diving deep into some of Instagram‚Äôs most popular interests and the people who make them awesome. Learn more about Lea-Sophie Jell on IGTV, and see more equestrian tricks from the amazing #equestrian community on today‚Äôs story.‚Å£‚Å£
‚Å£
Photo of @lea_jell_working_equitation by @photography_s0phia_

This is 30-year-old Nalie Agustin (@nalieagustin). She‚Äôs a self-described thriver, living (and traveling the world) with a stage 4 metastatic breast cancer diagnosis. ‚ÄúA lot of people consider people living with breast cancer ‚Äòsurvivors,‚Äô‚Äù says Nalie. ‚ÄúThat word seems a little too passive for everything I‚Äôve been through in the last six years. Thrivers go above and beyond their diagnosis and live beyond the limits of cancer.‚Äù‚Å£
‚Å£
‚ÄúMy goal is to show that there is hope. There is beauty in the battle ‚Äî and I think it‚Äôs our choice to see it. I think it‚Äôs up to us to put the effort into finding the positivity and the light in this journey, as hard as it is sometimes. There are beautiful stories out there and, for anything we‚Äôre going through in life, there is a way to find the light.‚Äù #BreastCancerAwareness‚Å£
‚Å£
Photo by @nalieagustin

‚Äú#YoSoy unapologetic,‚Äù says Johanna Toru√±o (@johannareign), a street artist and creator of @theunapologeticallybrownseries. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm utilizing public space to tell my story and to uplift other folks who I feel should take up as much space as possible in the streets.‚Äù‚Å£
‚Å£
This week, we continue sharing portraits of Hispanic Heritage Award winners, taken by fellow award recipient Alexsey Reyes (@alexseyreyes).‚Å£
‚Å£
Join Johanna and other members of the Latinx community by sharing your story using #YoSoy in celebration of #HispanicHeritageMonth, which runs through October 15 in the US.‚Å£
‚Å£
Photo of @johannareign by @alexseyreyes‚Å£
Illustration by @itscovl

See what life‚Äôs like for model Adut Akech (@adutakech) at Paris Fashion Week. ‚ú® On today‚Äôs story, follow along as Adut preps for the big Valentino (@maisonvalentino) show. üíñ üë†‚Å£

Photos of @adutakech by @winnniy (Adut‚Äôs sister!)

‚ÄúOut of 109 people aboard that plane, only two survived, and I was one of those two people. And that has to count for something.‚Äù Today, 14 years later, singer Kechi Okwuchi‚Äôs story inspires us all to remember we are so much more than our ‚Äúscars,‚Äù visible or invisible. üíï

In honor of National Bullying Prevention month, we‚Äôve partnered with @teenvogue to share stories of #Advocates who are taking a stand against bullying and sparking positive global change. ‚ú®

Meet Kechi Okwuchi (@kechiofficial). After being one of two survivors in a plane crash, she discovered her voice, through music and in advocating for other burn survivors. ‚ÄúIf I‚Äôm constantly giving out the impression that I‚Äôm very self-conscious about how different I look, or that my scars make me uncomfortable, or I‚Äôm always focused on my appearance, I feel like that‚Äôs all other people will see about me ‚Äî because that‚Äôs all I‚Äôm projecting out there,‚Äù explains Kechi. ‚ÄúI feel like being my authentic self is a way for me to help other people feel comfortable with me.‚Äù‚Å£‚Å£‚Å£
‚Å£‚Å£‚Å£
For National Bullying Prevention Month, we partnered with Teen Vogue (@teenvogue) to share the stories of amazing #Advocates who are taking a stand against bullying. Learn more about Kechi on IGTV right now.

Today, Facebook is launching Threads from Instagram, a new camera-first messaging app that helps you stay connected to your close friends. Threads is a stand-alone app designed with privacy, speed and your close connections in mind. You can share photos, videos, messages, Stories and now statuses with your Instagram close friends list. You are in control of who can reach you on Threads, and you can customize the experience around the people who matter most.‚Å£‚Å£‚Å£
‚Å£‚Å£‚Å£
We hope that Threads can bring you a little closer to the people you care about. Threads launches today and is available for download on both iOS and Android.‚Å£‚Å£‚Å£
‚Å£‚Å£‚Å£
Artwork by @fiance_knowles
